text: The Changan Eado DT is a subcompact sedan produced by Changan Automobile. Originally called the Alsvin V7 before the 2018 facelift. It is not to be confused with the Changan Eado compact sedan. ==Alsvin V7== The Alsvin V7 or Yuexiang V7 is the successor of the Alsvin subcompact sedan and also succeeding the Alsvin V5. Standing on a completely new platform adding a new 1.6L four-cylinder engine as a new option, the styling of the Alsvin V7 was also updated with Changan's latest design language. Price ranges from 60.900 yuan to 86.900 yuan. The Yuexiang V7 debuted in August 2014 on the 2014 Chengdu Auto Show. File:Chang'an Alsvin V7 01 China 2015-04-10.jpg|Front view of the Changan Alsvin V7. File:Chang'an Alsvin V7 02 China 2015-04-10.jpg|Rear view of the Changan Alsvin V7. ==Changan Eado DT== Changan Eado DT rear Debuting at the Beijing’s Auto Show in April 2018, the Changan Eado DT is positioned to be the entry model of the Eado family under the Changan Eado/Eado XT compact car. Being essentially a rebadged Alsvin V7, the dimensions are basically the same as that of the Alsvin V7. == References == == External links == * – Alsvin V7 Official website * – Eado DT Official website Category:Cars introduced in 2014 Category:2010s cars Category:Cars of China Category:Front-wheel-drive vehicles Alsvin V7 Category:Subcompact cars Category:Sedans
title: Changan Eado DT
